item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013-12-16-unplugged-controls-30/#comment-62">Sean Cull</a>.
<p>We're definitely going to blog more, and we have a session a bout the controls at IBM Connect in January, but they are most definitely aimed at mobile devices and not optimised for the desktop. If that's what you were after?</p>
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Sean Cull.

We’re definitely going to blog more, and we have a session a bout the controls at IBM Connect in January, but they are most definitely aimed at mobile devices and not optimised for the desktop. If that’s what you were after?

item.title: By: Sean Cull
item.dc:creator: Sean Cull
item.description: <p>Matt, have you ever blogged about the possible options to skip the "standard" Page Custom Controls and just use the Team Studio ones for everything => less to maintain - is this possible ?</p>
item.content:encoded: Matt, have you ever blogged about the possible options to skip the "standard" Page Custom Controls and just use the Team Studio ones for everything => less to maintain – is this possible ?
